name: Dark-Shattering Flame
title: Clorinde: Dark-Shattering Flame
in_play_description: After you trigger Electro-Related Reactions: +1 to the next instance of DMG Clorinde deals this Round. (Up to 3 stacks, +3 DMG total)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Clorinde to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Clorinde, equip this card.
After Clorinde equips this card, immediately use Hunter's Vigil once.
After you trigger Electro-Related Reactions, +1 to the next instance of DMG Clorinde deals this Round. (Up to 3 stacks, +3 DMG total)
(You must have Clorinde in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
